Northern Lights 2013

Get in Touch

Northern Lights is put together by a team of volunteers from industry and academia.

If you have any questions or suggestions please get in touch, we'd love to hear from you.

You can email us at northern.lights.conf@gmail.com

We are also on Twitter @northlight_conf.

If you have a more urgent need to speak to someone please don't hesitate to try one us directly on the details below.

Bruce Scharlau

Bruce is Senior Teaching Fellow in the Department of Computing Science at the University of Aberdeen. He is very active in the community, organising events throughout the year.

Twitter / @scharlau

Email / b.scharlau...

Steven is Solution Architect with Fifth Ring, he organises Refresh Aberdeen, dabbles with training card games and occassionally blogs.
